questions.question: 1. Let $X$ be a contiuous RV with PDF $f_X(x) = \begin{cases} x^2-\frac{1}{2} & 0 \leq x \leq 1 \\ 0 & otherwise \end{cases}$. For $n\in N$, calculate $E[X^n]$.

explanations.a: Wrong answer. In $E[X^n], x is only a integration variable.$
explanations.b: Wrong Answer. Use $E[X^n] = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} x^n f_X(x) dx$
explanations.d: Wrong answer. One of the above is correct

questions.question: 2.  Let $X$ be a contiuous RV with PDF $f_X(x) = \begin{cases} x^2-\frac{1}{2} & 0 \leq x \leq 1 \\ 0 & otherwise \end{cases}$. Find $Var(X)$

explanations.d: Wrong answer. One of the above is correct

questions.question: 3.  Let $f_X(x) = \begin{cases} ce^{-3x} & x \geq 0 \\ 0 & otherwise \end{cases}$. Find value of $c$ such that $f_X(x)$ is a valid PDF

explanations.a: Wrong answer.It should satisfy $\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f_X(x) dx = 1$
explanations.b: Wrong answer. It should satisfy $\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f_X(x) dx = 1$
explanations.d: Wrong answer. One of the above is correct

questions.question: 4. Find $P(1<X<3)$ for the above RV in question 3

explanations.b: Wrong answer. $P(1<X<3) = \int_{1}^{3} f_X(x) dx$. Als0, check the option correctly.
explanations.d: Wrong answer. One of the above is correct

questions.question: 5. Let $X$ be a uniform discrete RV with range $\mathbb{R}_X = \{0,\frac{\pi}{4},\frac{\pi}{2},\frac{3\pi}{4},\pi\}$. Find $E[sin(X)]$

explanations.d: Wrong answer. One of the above is correct
